name: Typetura
author: Typetura

sections.description:
Typetura transforms the typography on your WordPress website. Just select a typographic package and see all the text on your website transform. Your website can have big, bold, responsive type, regardless of the layout or theme you use.

100% of subscription revenue from June and July goes to organizations that nurture the growth of young Black people.

Getting Started

To use Typetura on your website, your first need a paid account. You can create one on the Typetura website. You now have an API key that you can find in your Typetura settings.

If you would like to try Typetura before buying an account, you can do that without an API key on localhost.

If you need anything else, try reading our documentation, or reach out to support@typetura.com.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP version 5.4.45 or greater (PHP 7.2 or greater is recommended)
  • MySQL version 5.5 or greater (MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended)

Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Type “Typetura” in the search field and click “Search Plugins”.
  3. Click “Install Now” to install and then click “Activate”.
  4. Visit the Typetura website and create a paid account.
  5. Copy your API key from your account settings.
  6. Go to Settings > Typetura Settomgs.
  7. Paste your API key and select a Typetura package.

Manual Installation

  1. Download a copy of the “Typetura” plugin
  2. Upload typetura to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  4. Visit the Typetura website and create a paid account.
  5. Copy your API key from your account settings.
  6. Go to Settings > Typetura Settomgs.
  7. Paste your API key and select a Typetura package.
sections.faq:
Do I need a paid Typetura account to use this on my website?

Yes. You can create an account here: https://typetura.com/auth/create-account

Can I try this plugin without a Typetura acount?

Yes, This plugin will work when developing your website on localhost.

Can I customize my theme to take better advantage of Typetura?

Yes, be sure to check out our documentation: https://docs.typetura.com/

This appears to break my theme! what should I do?

Reach out to us at support@typetura.com with a link to your website and description of where things are breaking and we will get back to you with a fix ASAP.
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • Added WYSIWYG typography editor and refine where packages pull from

1.0.4

  • Added scale factor

1.0.3

  • Added Black Lives Matter note

1.0.2

  • More clear instructions on the settings panel

1.0.1

  • Documentation updates
  • Added screenshots and icons

1.0.0

  • The first release of Typetura, a fluid typesetting plugin, for WordPress
